attributes.action: Keep the Olympic Park as a National (and International) Training Centre
attributes.additional_details:
We urge the Government Department for Culture, Media and Sport to keep and maintain the 2012 Olympic Park as a National (and International) Training Centre.

Facilities could be let out to a variety of different Sports Clubs and Associations (from the UK and abroad), and the current Accommodation could be used for athletes and their coaches to stay in, for the duration of them using the facilities.

Now wouldn't that be a real lasting legacy to UK Sport!
